DCL Public API: Console I/O

Send comments on this topic.

Summary

DclInputChar   Obtain character input.
DclInputServiceInit   Initialize the input service.
DclOutputServiceInit   Initialize the output service.
DclOutputString   Output a string.

DclInputChar

DCLSTATUS DclInputChar(
    DCLINSTANCEHANDLE hDclInst,
    D_UCHAR *puChar,
    unsigned nFlags)
Obtain character input.

When this function is used by common, OS independent code, it be assumed that the OS interface may wait for a character, or even the [Enter] key before returning from this function.

When this function is used from OS specific code, where the OS characteristics are known, it may return immediately with a DCLSTAT_INPUT_IDLE status.

Parameters

hDclInst - The DCL instance handle. May be NULL to use the default DCL instance.
puChar - A pointer to a buffer to receive the character. The contents of this field will only be modified if DCLSTAT_SUCCESS is returned.
nFlags - This parameter is reserved for future use and must be 0.

Return Value

Returns one of the following DCLSTATUS values...

DCLSTAT_SUCCESS - A character was returned
DCLSTAT_INPUT_DISABLED - The input interface is disabled
DCLSTAT_INPUT_IDLE - There is no input ready
DCLSTAT_INPUT_TERMINATE - The OS is terminating the program Other...

DclInputServiceInit

DCLSTATUS DclInputServiceInit( DCLINSTANCEHANDLE hDclInst)
Initialize the input service.

Parameters

hDclInst - The DCL instance handle.

Return Value

Returns a DCLSTATUS code indicating the results.

DclOutputServiceInit

DCLSTATUS DclOutputServiceInit( DCLINSTANCEHANDLE hDclInst)
Initialize the output service.

Parameters

hDclInst - The DCL instance handle.

Return Value

Returns a DCLSTATUS code indicating the results.

DclOutputString

DCLSTATUS DclOutputString(
    DCLINSTANCEHANDLE hDclInst,
    const char *pszStr)
Output a string.

This is the workhorse display function used for both general messages as well as debugging messages.

Parameters

hDclInst - The DCL instance handle. May be NULL to use the default DCL instance.
pszStr - A pointer to the null-terminated string.

Return Value

Returns a DCLSTATUS code indicating the results.
